Package eu.cassandra.sim

Class Summary
DemographicData The simulation's demographic data, used to instantiate entities in dynamic scenarios.
Event A simulation event.
Level A level-price pair, used in pricing policies.
MySimpleDynamicScenarioSimulation Class MySimpleDynamicScenarioSimulation provides an example implementation of the setupScenario() method that programmatically builds all entities involved in the scenario "described" in the input file "SimpleDynamicScenario.txt".
MySimpleStaticScenarioSimulation Class MySimpleStaticScenarioSimulation provides an example implementation of the setupScenario() method that programmatically builds all entities involved in the scenario "described" in the input file "SimpleStaticScenario.txt".
Offpeak A from-to pair defining an offpeak period of pricing, used in pricing policies.
Period A from-to-price tripplet defining a period of specific pricing, used in pricing policies.
PricingPolicy A pricing policy to be used in the simulation.
PricingPolicy.Builder The Builder class for Pricing Policies.
SimCalendar The simulation's calendar.
Simulation The Simulation class includes methods for setting up the scenario to be simulated and running the simulation, provided the implementation of the abstract setupScenario() method.
SimulationParams The simulation's parameter set.
StandAloneSimulation The StandAloneSimulation class includes an implementation of the setupScenario() method that parses a properly formatted input text file and
(a) sets up the installations (or installation types) to be included in the simulation,
(b) sets up the pricing scheme(s) to be used in the simulation,
(c) defines the set of simulation parameters to be used and, in case of dynamic scenarios,
(d) the demographic data, according to which the entities involved in the simulation will be instantiated.
